name: Tribrigade Line
text: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Beast, Beast-Warrior, and Winged Beast monsters. You can send 1 monster from your hand or field to the GY; add 1 "Tribrigade" monster from your Deck to your hand with a different original Type than the monster you sent to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Tribrigade Line" once per turn. If this card in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can activate this effect; your opponent cannot declare an attack for the rest of this turn.
